positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description:
Miscelleanous software projects built with MERN stack (for the most part)
([wordbase.app](https://wordbase.app)) remake of discontinued multiplayer word game
               launched on ProductHunt ([link](https://www.producthunt.com/products/wordbase-app))
([wordle.freshman.dev](https://wordle.freshman.dev)) leaderboard for programmatic Wordle solvers
([dinder.social](https://dinder.social)) make new recipes with random people on the internet
([pico-packet](https://pico.cafe)) resources for getting started with the Raspberry Pi Pico, including [pico-fi](https://github.com/cfreshman/pico-fi)
([follow-sync.freshman.dev](https://follow-sync.freshman.dev)) sync follows between Twitter and Mastodon
([basin.fish](https://basin.fish)) fishbowl, a party game similar to charades, built on [wwl.js](https://github.com/cfreshman/wwl.js)
([daily-nonogram](https://no.tu.fo)) daily nonogram puzzles

positions.title: Software Development Engineer
description:
Developed unstructured path planning API for autonomous warehouse vehicles ([demo](https://freshman.dev/raw/paths))
Implemented real-time event stream processor for vehicle allocation
Optimized tier-1 data pipeline service ecosystem to improve scaling of accessor API by 1500%
Designed internal alarming library used across adjacent teams
Simplified management of throttling system and collaborated on self-service workflow for clients
Presented technical design decisions
Undertook occasional UI design work
Mentored intern project and positively influenced programming methodology of colleagues

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
description:
Developed full-stack feature for MATLAB Online’s Import Tool
Implemented several heavy UI elements for MATLAB’s Property Inspector, including colormap ([detail](https://freshman.dev/raw/cv/MathWorks/colormap))
Created graphics performance reporting app for progress tracking

positions.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description:
589 Machine Learning – 514 Data Science – 583 Game Programming – 383 Artificial Intelligence
403 Robotics – 326 Web Programming – 611 Advanced Algorithms – MATH MVCalc LinAlg DiffEq

positions.title: Semester Abroad
description: 373 Computer Graphics – 351 Database Systems – 345 Human-Computer Interaction

positions.title: 3D Game Development in Unity
description: Designed physics-based couch game with Nintendo Joy-Cons for player input ([link](https://matchbox.zip))

positions.title: Hierarchical Control System for Simulated Pong-Playing Robot
description: Composed behavior from low-level PD controllers to integrated gameplay for course competition

positions.title: Hackathon Competition
description: Won ‘Most Innovative’ for idea with random group while studying at University of Auckland

positions.title: Team Lead, Competitive Programming Interest Group
description:
Achieved 6th place in the ICPC 2017 Northeast North America Regional Contest ([scoreboard](https://icpc.global/regionals/finder/northeast-north-america-2018/standings))
Qualified at BOSPRE Preliminary as first-time ICPC competitor ([scoreboard](https://hc3.seas.harvard.edu/hc3/bospre/2017/scoreboard.web))

positions.title: Secretary, Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) Student Chapter

description:
Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, C/C++, C#, Kotlin, Ruby, MATLAB, HTML/CSS, SQL
MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS), Django, Dojo Toolkit
AWS, Chromium DevTools, Git, Unix shell, REST APIs, Service-Oriented Architecture, Agile
